title: Erica Komisar: "Chicken Little the Sky Isn't Falling"
description: Michael speaks with Erica Komisar, LCSW, author of "Chicken Little the Sky Isn't Falling: Raising Resilient Adolescents in the New Age of Anxiety." Original air date 27 January 2022. The book was published on 2 November 2021.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Erica Komisar, Michael Smerconish)
